channel.title: --Is this right?--

item.title: --Is this right?--
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

i made a command here it is:

if (command.startsWith(“home”))
{
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(4039, 0) || playerHasItemAmount(4037, 0)) {
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3089;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
playerIsSaradomin = false;
playerIsZamorak = false;
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need to get rid of the flag first!”);
}

but where ever i type it in i just removes the flage and doesnt say any thing or do anything.
can i get some on to show me how this command is sopost to be?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 02:33:05 PM[/size][hr]nm i got it. looks like this now:

if (command.startsWith(“home”))
{
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(4039, 1) || playerHasItemAmount(4037, 1)) {
sendMessage(“You need to get rid of the flag first!”);
}
else {
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3089;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
playerIsSaradomin = false;
playerIsZamorak = false;
}

Read full topic
